name: LD51-Security Failure
description:
Oct 4 2022:

  • Bug fix to prevent crashing after game over
  • Bug fix to prevent Enter from removing focus
  • The original can still be downloaded an played locally, but the bug fix version is recommended. 

Goal is to break the encryption by answering the questions with the clues around you.

It is strongly recommended to play in full screen mode.

Mouse - Look around

Use keyboard to input answers

Correct answers are auto submitted

Be aware U/V and O/0 look very similar. If the code is not accepted try changing these characters.
